page.title: 19SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: Everyone in the dale knows everyone else. There are few clubs and no organised sport, apart from an{Annual {Sports Day}for the young people. There is a{Jubilee Club,}formed by a group of ladies. They meet once a month and have competitions, slide shows, speakers and outings. The WEA holds classes in the school. There is a monthly{Whist Drive}open to anyone wishing to play. During the winter months there are regular darts matches in local pubs. Teams are drawn from the community and supper is provided. Pool is also played and around Christmas there are several{domino {drives.}There is an annual Sunday School outing when all the dale's children go off for a day in July. At {Christmas}there is a{Dale's Party}when everyone is welcome at the school for games, dancing and supper.
